content: nana june s blessing blanket designed for camp boggy creek - designed by juan the yarn addict materials used mandala gradient cakes purple 1475 yards 5 cakes 6mm crochet hook abbreviations/meanings chain chain double_crochet double_crochet dcc double_crochet cross half_double_crochet half_double_crochet sdcc stacked double crochet cross skip skip space - space st s stitch/stitches block stitch 4 double_crochet in the same st chain 5 slip to the 1st chain to form a circle chain 3 counts as a double_crochet round 1 front - block stitch insert 3 double_crochet in chain circle chain 2 4 double_crochet chain 2 4 double_crochet chain 2 4 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st of the round round 2 back - block stitch chain 3 and turn insert 3 double_crochet in corner chain space * insert block stitch in between block stitches from previous round in the corner chain space insert 4 double_crochet chain 2 4 double_crochet repeat * until the end of the round in the last corner space insert 4 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st of the round round 3 front - double_crochet cross dcc chain 3 and turn insert 1dc in corner space * insert double_crochet in between 2nd and 3rd st in the block st from the previous round and then insert 1dc in the corner chain space to form a dcc insert 1 dcc around the next 2 sts insert 1 dcc cross around each of the next 2 sts until the corner chain space in the corner chain space insert 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the end of the round in the last corner space insert 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st of the round round 4 back - stacked double_crochet cross sdcc chain 3 and turn insert 1 double_crochet in the corner chain space * insert 1 double_crochet cross around the first 2 sts then around each of the dcc from the previous round and the last 2 sts before the corner in the corner chain space insert 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the end of the round in the last corner space insert 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st of the round round 5 front - double_crochet twins in a stitch chain 3 and turn insert 1 double_crochet in the chain space * skip 2 sts and insert 2 double_crochet in the space between the second st and the sdcc from the previous round then 2 double_crochet in between all sdcc and before the last 2 sts before the corner in the corner chain space insert 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet repeat * until the end of the round in the last corner insert 2 double_crochet then perform a half_double_crochet join to the last chain before the first st of the round round 6 back
